localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Easynote is customizable productivity and work managent platform scalable to any team or project. It allows you to organise everything in one single place.
blogPost.body: Easynote is customizable productivity and work managent platform scalable to any team or project. It allows you to organise everything in one single place.
blogPost.title: Easynote - One tool to manage all your work in one single place
blogPost.author: Mensur Zahirovic

localize.description: Easynote 是一个可定制的生产力和工作管理平台，可扩展到任何团队或项目。它允许你在一个地方组织一切。
localize.tagline: 一个工具可以在一个地方管理你所有的工作

localize.description: Easynote 是一個可定製的生產力和工作管理平臺，可擴展到任何團隊或項目。它允許你在一個地方組織一切。
localize.tagline: 一個工具可以在一個地方管理你所有的工作

previous.excerpt: Stream’s UI + SDKs for in-app chat allow you to build a beautiful and scalable chat experience in hours. 50+ handcrafted screens for Figma & Sketch. UI components for Flutter, React Native, Kotlin & Swift. Free maker accounts available for side projects.
previous.title: Mobile Chat Kit - UI kits & sample apps for building in-app mobile chat

localize.description: Stream的UI+SDK的应用内聊天功能，让你可以在几个小时内构建一个漂亮的、可扩展的聊天体验。为Figma和Sketch手工制作的50多个屏幕。Flutter、React Native、Kotlin & Swift的UI组件。免费的制造者账户可用于副项目。
localize.tagline: 用于构建应用内移动聊天的UI套件和示例应用。

localize.description: Stream的UI+SDK的應用內聊天功能，讓你可以在幾個小時內構建一個漂亮的、可擴展的聊天體驗。爲Figma和Sketch手工製作的50多個屏幕。Flutter、React Native、Kotlin & Swift的UI組件。免費的製造者賬戶可用於副項目。
localize.tagline: 用於構建應用內移動聊天的UI套件和示例應用。
